skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Tsunami
rune.description:
Crippling Wave's third attack has its range increased to 17 yards and Freezes enemies for 1 second.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Crippling Wave's third attack has increased range and Freezes enemies.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Soothing Breeze
rune.description:
Cyclone Strike heals you and all allies within 24 yards for 31036 Life.

Heal amount is increased by 17% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
rune.simpleDescription: Cyclone Strike heals you and your allies.

skill.name: Mantra of Healing
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Shroud you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs up to 62064 damage for 3 seconds. Absorb amount is increased by 15% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 10728 increased Life regeneration. The heal amount is increased by 7% of your Life per Second.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: Shroud you and your allies with a mystical shield that absorbs damage.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased Life regeneration.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Time of Need
rune.description: Passive: Mantra of Healing also reduces damage taken by 30% when below 50% Life.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Mantra of Healing also reduces damage taken when below half Life.

skill.name: Blinding Flash
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Create a flash of light that blinds all enemies within 20 yards for 3 seconds. Elite enemies recover faster, but suffer a 30% chance to miss with attacks.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Blind all nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

rune.name: Crippling Light
rune.description: Enemies that are Blinded deal 25% reduced damage for 5 seconds after the Blind wears off.
rune.simpleDescription: Enemies that are Blinded deal reduced damage after the Blind wears off.

skill.name: Inner Sanctuary
skill.description:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Create a runic circle of protection on the ground for 6 seconds that reduces all damage taken by 55% for all allies inside.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Create a runic circle of protection that reduces all damage taken for all allies inside.

rune.name: Intervene
rune.description:
Dash to the target location, granting a shield that absorbs up to 107284 damage for 3 seconds to allies within 11 yards and then creating Inner Sanctuary.

Absorb amount is increased by 28% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.
rune.simpleDescription: Dash to the target location, granting nearby allies an absorb shield and then creating Inner Sanctuary.

skill.name: Epiphany
skill.description:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second by 20 and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Have an Epiphany, increasing your Spirit Regeneration per Second and enabling your melee attacks to instantly dash to your target for 15 seconds.

rune.name: Desert Shroud
rune.description: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken by 50%.
rune.simpleDescription: Infuse yourself with sand, reducing damage taken.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: The Guardian's Path
skill.description: While dual-wielding, you gain a 35% chance to dodge incoming attacks. While using a two-handed weapon, all Spirit generation is increased by 15%.
skill.flavor: "No weapon can overcome the weakness of an undisciplined mind. They can only serve as an extension of the self." —Waykeeper Tzo Krin

transmogItem.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

mainHand.name: Thunderfury, Blessed Blade of the Windseeker

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Intimidate
skill.description: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed by 80% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription: Enemies that hit or are hit by the Templar are slowed.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.
